00034 include_once("../../include.inc.php");
00035 
00036 $rulenumber = $_GET['rulenumber'];
00037 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber];
00038 
00039 if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'queue') {
00040     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00041     $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'queue';
00042 }
00043 
00044 if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00045     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00046     $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'];
00047 }
00048 
00049 if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save']) && isset($rule['identifier'])) {
00050     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00051     $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber];
00052 }
00053 
00054 if (isset($_GET['dropqueue'])) {
00055     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->delEntity ("queue", $_GET['rulenumber'], $_GET['dropqueue']);
00056     for ($i = '0'; $i < count($_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules); $i++) {
00057         if ($_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$i]['name'] ==  $_GET['dropqueue']) {
00058             $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->del ($i);
00059         }
00060     }
00061     reload();
00062 }
00063 
00064 if (isset($_POST['addqueue']) && (!preg_match("/ueue name/", $_POST['addqueue']))) {
00065     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->addEntity("queue", $rulenumber, preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['addqueue']));
00066     $_newQueue = $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->addRule();
00067     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$_newQueue]['name'] = preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['addqueue']);
00068     $_SESSION['edit']['addedQueues'][] = $_newQueue;
00069     reload();
00070 }
00071 
00072 if (count($_POST)) {
00073     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['interface'] =  $_POST['interface'];
00074     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['bandwidth'] =  $_POST['bandwidth'];
00075     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['scheduler'] =  $_POST['scheduler'];
00076     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['priority'] =   $_POST['priority'];
00077     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['qlimit'] =     $_POST['qlimit'];
00078     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['comment'] =        $_POST['comment'];
00079 
00080     $parameters = array();
00081     if ($_POST['default'])  { $parameters[] = "default"; }
00082     if ($_POST['ecn'])      { $parameters[] = "ecn"; }
00083     if ($_POST['rio'])      { $parameters[] = "rio"; }
00084     if ($_POST['red'])      { $parameters[] = "red"; }
00085     if ($_POST['borrow'])   { $parameters[] = "borrow"; }
00086     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['parameters'] = $parameters;
00087     
00088     $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber];
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*
00092 * go back
00093 */
00094 if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00095     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber] = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00096     if (!isset($_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$rulenumber]['interface'])) {
00097         $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->del ($rulenumber);
00098         foreach ($_SESSION['edit']['addedQueues'] as $_newQueue) {
00099             $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->del ($_newQueue);
00100         }
00101     }
00102     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00103     header ("Location: queue.php");
00104 }
00105 
00106 if (isset($_POST['save']) && $_POST['save'] == "save and return") {
00107     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00108     header ("Location: queue.php");
00109 }
00110

00112 * Begin Output
00113 */
